title: Interpretation
text: To find the area of the rectangle, multiply base and height.
speech: To find the area of the rectangle, multiply base and height.

title: Area
text: The height given is $$h=\frac{1}{20}$$, and the base is $$b=20$$. $$Area=b h$$.
